Question: You have 5 Death and need 2 more VP. Is it better to pay the Cursed Forge curse this turn or let it turn?
Answer: Pay 1 Death to keep it upright and preserve its 2 VP.
Rationale: Turning Cursed Forge would nullify its VP this round. Paying 1 Death is cheaper than finding 2 new VP elsewhere.:contentReference[oaicite:72]{index=72}:contentReference[oaicite:73]{index=73}
